name: Rainbow Sandwich
description:
It's sandwich time, folks.  Rainbow Sandwich time.

Flip the ball up into the colored cups in the sky. Mix and match colors. Score big points. 

Avoid combining complementary colors. You know the ones. Yellow and purple. Blue and orange. Red and green. (shudder) Those bad matches bring the rainclouds. And if it gets too cloudy, this game gets called on account of you lose.

But if you're lucky, the mysteriously turning color wheel may grant you a magical powerup that you can use to bust away those clouds before it's too late!

Other gameplay fun: Get annoyed when the hummingbird gets in your way and messes up your nice shot.

More gameplay fun: Get excited that the hummingbird is your FWEND when she bumps your ball into the cup for the big score!

Even more gameplay fun.: Get extremely annoyed when the ball suddenly slows down or gets randomly stuck during the game (hey, just like REAL PINBALL, amiright?). Maybe the hummingbird will help you out this time. Maybe she won't.

P.S. The hummingbird doesn't care.
